data.name: RPG Maker MZ - MV Enemies - character sprites
data.detailed_description:
MV Enemies - character sprites

This software is a collection of character sprites version of Enemies (22 regular size, 4 large size) of the default data used in RPG Maker MV.

*You can use all enemies in the MV to use as character sprites with the default character sprites together.

*********************************************************
Contents

Regular size Enemies: 4 sheets of 22 Enemies (Data of scenes for the moving back, forth, left, right, and the lying scene)
Large size Enemies: 1 sheet of 4 Enemies (Behemoth, Chimera, Lamia, Ogre)
*********************************************************
